titleStmt.title: Teares on the death of Meliades
titleStmt.author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andro Hart, and are to be sold at his shop on the north-side of the high streete, a litle beneath the Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: W. Dr., i.e. William Drummond.
On the death of Henry Frederick, Prince of Wales.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop on the north-side of the high streete, a litle beneath the Crosse
